help.title: Help
help.subtitle: How PillTracker works
help.intro: You can manage medications and groups, schedule reminders, and track your intake in a simple way.

addMedication.title: Add a medication
addMedication.body: Tap + Medication and enter name, dosage, days, and times. Then save with Save.

groups.title: Use groups
groups.body: Create a medication group with + Group. This helps you keep related medications organized.

reminders.title: Plan reminders
reminders.body: Select weekdays and times. If notifications are enabled, the app reminds you at the scheduled time.

track.title: Track intake
track.body: When you have taken a medication, slide the tracker to the right. The intake is saved immediately.

due.title: See due medications
due.body: If a scheduled time is reached and not tracked yet, the card is highlighted so you can see what is still open.

lastTaken.title: Last taken
lastTaken.body: Each card shows the latest intake timestamp. This helps when you are not sure if you already took it.
